name: kubebox
description: Terminal and Web console for Kubernetes
author: Antonin Stefanutti

scripts.browserify: browserify -r ./lib/config/context.js:context -r ./lib/http-then.js:http-then -r ./lib/kubebox.js:kubebox -r ./lib/task.js:task -r blessed -r urijs -i clipboardy -u pty.js -u xterm -u term.js -o docs/kubebox.js
scripts.browserify-debug: browserify --debug -r ./lib/config/context.js:context -r ./lib/http-then.js:http-then -r ./lib/kubebox.js:kubebox -r ./lib/task.js:task -r blessed -r urijs -i clipboardy -u pty.js -u xterm -u term.js | exorcist docs/kubebox.js.map > docs/kubebox.js
scripts.bundle: browserify index.js -o bundle.js -u pty.js -u term.js -u spawn-sync --node
